text: Marc-Guillaume Alexis Vadier (17 July 1736 – 14 December 1828) was a major French politician of the French Revolution. He is sometimes called the "Great Inquisitor", for his active participation in the Reign of Terror. Category:1736 births Category:1828 deaths Category:Presidents of the National Convention Category:Politicians from Occitanie Category:People from Ariège
title: Marc-Guillaume Alexis Vadier
